name: Brooks Canopy Jacket - Women's
description:
Exactly what you want when the weather shifts 2km into your run. This lightweight, packable jacket blocks UPF, and offers wind and water-resistance. It easily packs into a pocket when you don't need it and has a hood and zippered pockets to make it super-functional.DryLayer Seal ripstop polyester is wind- and rain-resistant to keep you comfortable when the weather doesn't cooperate.Breathable fabric has UPF 30 sun protection to shelter you on cool, sunny days.Stuffs into front zip pocket for easy packing.Hidden thumbholes keep sleeves in place while you move.Stowable hood snaps into place to keep it from flopping around.Semi-fitted to contour to your body and let you move without being restricted.

        Sustainability
